attributes.action: Provide an email distribution list for all  ACTIVE UK and EU online surveys and petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nobody ever hears about online (or other) surveys until after the fact. This makes the results of such surveys very suspect. Did that survey actually take place or were the results invented?

If people KNOW about surveys, they can take part. A simple "subscribe" command to a listserver from an email client is all that is needed.
